contextId.information: A mina is 600 grams. Each mina was worth about what someone would be paid in four months. AT: "ten valuable coins" or "a large amount of money" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bweight]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

A mina is 600 grams. Each mina was worth about what someone would be paid in four months. See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:luk:19:13|19:13]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bweight]])
